title: Library Request: vectorbt
body:
[vectorbt](https://vectorbt.dev/) It's a performant vectorized backtesting framework, useful for running backtests from the research environment, where you want to quickly validate hypotheses prior to the LEAN platform. 


#### Checklist
<!--- Confirm that you've provided all the required information. -->
<!--- Required fields --->
- [x] I have completely filled out this template
- [x] I have confirmed that this issue exists on the current `master` branch
- [x] I have confirmed that this is not a duplicate issue by searching [issues](https://github.com/QuantConnect/Lean/issues)

comments.body: Sorry not planned. I'd prefer to put efforts into making our own vectorized backtest support.
